decision_conditions: <p style="padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt"><span style="line-height: 150%;"><span arial="" style="">All new external and internal works and finishes and works of making good to the retained fabric shall match the existing adjacent work with regard to the methods used and material</span><span arial="" style="">s, colour, texture and profile, unless shown otherwise on the drawings or other documentation hereby approved or required by any conditions(s) attached to this consent.</span></span></p>

<p style="padding: 0cm 5.4pt;"><span style="line-height: 150%;"><span arial="" style="">If previously unknown evidence is discovered about historic character which would be affected by the works hereby granted, an appropriate record, together with recommendations for dealing with it in the context of the scheme, shall be approved in writing by the local planning authority before any of the permitted works are begun.</span><span arial="" style=""> The works shall be completed in accordance with the approved details and shall be retained as such thereafter.</span></span></p><p><br data-cke-eol="1"></p>

<p style="padding: 0cm 5.4pt;"><span arial="" style="">Before the relevant part of the works commence, details of&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 150%;"><span arial="">samples of materials shall be provided to, made available on site, and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.</span></span></p><p><br data-cke-eol="1"></p>

<p style="padding: 0cm 5.4pt;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">Before the works commence, a repair plan by a suitable specialist including scaled pre-existing and proposed detailed elevations, plans, sections to a scale of 1:10 or 1:20 and photographs as appropriate shall be provided to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.&nbsp;</span></p>

<p style="padding: 0cm 5.4pt;"><span style="line-height: 150%;">The works hereby permitted shall be undertaken in full within eighteen months from the date of this consent and retained in place thereafter.</span></p>
site_name: Gate Posts Junction Of High Street
description: Listed Building Consent: Rebuilding of Gate Pier
